data.eml:eml: Aleurodicus talamancensis, a new whitefly species damaging plantation bananas in Costa Rica, with discussion of a montane orchid­feeding population (Sternorrhyncha, Aleyrodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Jon H. (2005): Aleurodicus talamancensis, a new whitefly species damaging plantation bananas in Costa Rica, with discussion of a montane orchid­feeding population (Sternorrhyncha, Aleyrodidae). Zootaxa 843: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170709
